title: Know your data types by heart
text: I had an interview today, and they asked what the primary data types are. I straight up choked. Memorize 'em!

title: Arrow functions are KEY
text: It's another way to write a normal function that has a return by default, since the function is stored in a variable.

title: Don't give up!
text: Putting in hundreds of applications can be tough, so cast a really wide net, have a presence on all media accounts, and get known the natural way!
